Characters.Name: Troy Lakes
Characters.About: He's been through a lot, and has big trust issues to put it mildy. In fact, his motto is to trust no one, but what happens when he's presented with someone who actually cares?

Characters.Name: Caldwell Wicker
Characters.About: He's a kind, gentle man, but he's also a vampire. He seems haunted by his past, as well as Troy's presence. But, what could Troy, a 21st century man, have to do with a Victorian's past?
